RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduaзгo em Psicologia - La Sapienza-Universitа degli Studi di Roma (1998), mestrado em Psicologia - University of California Davis (2004) e doutorado em Developmental Psychology - University of California Davis (2009). Tem experiкncia na бrea de Psicologia, com кnfase em desenvolvimento cognitivo e psicologia jurнdica, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: falsas memуrias, metamemуria, testemunho infantil.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: She obtained the bachelor's degree in Developmental Psychology from the Universitа degli Studi di Roma, La Sapienza (1998), a master's in Social Psychology from the University of California Davis (2004) and a doctorate in Developmental Psychology from the University of California Davis (2009). Her areas of expertise are cognitive development and psychology and law. Particularly, she is interested in investigating the memorial and metamemorial processes underlying false memory formation and rejection. She is also interested in developing training procedures to improve memory accuracy and resistance to false memory formation in forensic interview settings.
